title: Christmas Tree Touch Live Wallpaper
features: set speed water ripple effect in setting
description: **Beautiful Christmas Tree Live Wallpaper with Ripple Touch effect, magical touch water's ripple touch effect**, this ripple touch effect could easily created with your finger when you touch the screen and when your phone receive a text message or phone call, this ripple touch effect animation also appear. This live wallpaper is a beautiful cool nature holiday scenery : christmas tree with magic ripple touch effect.=== Settings Live Wallpaper ===In setting menu is possible to set your own picture, background or wallpaper to be live wallpaper background from setting menu. Also there are three different cool christmas tree wallpaper backgrounds and different number of ripple touch effect and it's speed.This live wallpaper could really make your day and very attractive.Enjoy!!!Instruction for use:Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live WallpapersA Christmas tree is a decorated tree, usually an evergreen conifer such as spruce, or pine or fir, traditionally associated with the celebration of Christmas. An artificial Christmas tree is an object made to resemble such a tree, usually made from polyvinyl chloride (PVC).The tree was traditionally decorated with edibles such as apples, nuts or dates. In the 18th century, it began to be illuminated by candles, which with electrification could also be replaced by Christmas lights. Today, there are a wide variety of traditional ornaments, such as garland, tinsel, and candy canes. An angel or star may be placed at the top of the tree, to represent the host of angels or the Star of Bethlehem from the Nativity.
